passive.name: Establishment
passive.description: Increases the wearer's base SPD by <orangeStrong>{{1}}</orangeStrong>. After the wearer and the wearer's memosprite attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of "Brocade." Each stack of "Brocade" increases the wearer's and their memosprite's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>, stacking up to {{2}} time(s). When reaching maximum stacks, each "Brocade" stack additionally increases Basic ATK DMG dealt by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>.
